title: $500 Off! Special Ends In 24 Hrs! 2 sparkling pools! Central A/C!
posting_body: The Tides At Spring Valley offers a mixture of comfort and style.
This property is situated on 4747 Pennwood Avenue in Las Vegas.
The professional leasing staff is ready to help you find your perfect home.
When you choose an apartment at The Tides At Spring Valley, you'll have access to top amenities and features including: window coverings, patios, and balconies.
So get a head start on your move.
Stop by today to experience all new renovations at The Tides At Spring Valley!
in the heart of Las Vegas, The Tides At Spring Valley is a scenic oasis tucked away from the hustle and bustle of the city life.

With access to the city's most desirable attractions like the famous Las Vegas Strip, exceptional shopping at Premium Outlets, tasteful dining at World Famous Eateries, a fabulous night life, or casual outdoor activities like hiking or relaxing lakeside, you are sure to find a lifestyle that fits your most desirable qualities.
This surprising oasis is a hidden gem with lush greenery throughout the property.
You will enjoy relaxing at your beautiful sparkling pools or having a picnic under the sun in the resident courtyard.
The Tides At Spring Valley has an exceptional staff that is excited to welcome you home!
We offer spacious ONE BEDROOMS, TWO BEDROOMS Each unit comes fully-appointed with FULL size appliances &   walk-in closet(s)
*Featuring restaurants, boutique shops, modern fitness facilities, and fun events each month.
Pricing may include current special and is subject to change without notice.
